optimization_for: Discovery page algorithm, For You Page, viral potential

scripts.title: Rate Music Get Paid
scripts.hook: [Point at camera] "Your music taste doesn't pay... until now"
scripts.body: [Screen record platform] Rate tracks â†’ Earn tokens â†’ Get promoted â†’ Buy merch
scripts.cta: [Point up] Link in bio to clock in

scripts.title: Honest Rating POV
scripts.hook: [Serious face] POV: About to rate a track that thinks it's fire
text_overlays: Someone had to be honest ðŸ¤·
scripts.virality: Very High - POV format + relatable honesty

scripts.title: When Hook HITS
scripts.virality: Very High - genuine discovery + promotes artist

scripts.title: Hook vs Production Debate
scripts.hook: Hot take: Hook matters MORE than production
scripts.body: [Show two tracks] Perfect mix + weak hook = skip. Good hook + decent mix = hit. Change my mind.
text_overlays: This is the hill I die on

scripts.title: Rank Progression Flex
scripts.body: [Show progression timeline] Week 1: Intern. Week 2: Manager. Now: Executive. 200 ratings. 1500 tokens.

scripts.title: Red Flags That Kill Tracks
scripts.hook: 5 things that make me skip a track instantly
scripts.body: [Fast cuts] 1. Muddy vocals 2. Hook after 30sec 3. Clipping/distortion 4. Generic beat 5. Off-key singing

scripts.title: Factory Certified Celebration
scripts.hook: When a track you rated finally gets Factory Certified
scripts.body: [Celebration dance] I KNEW IT. My rating: 9.2. Community: 9.3. VALIDATED.

scripts.title: This vs That Format
scripts.body: [Split screen] Track A: Perfect production, weak hook. Track B: Good hook, decent mix. [Poll graphic] Vote in comments.
scripts.virality: Very High - binary choices drive massive comments

scripts.title: Hidden Gem Discovery
scripts.hook: Just discovered this artist with 200 followers
scripts.body: [Play track snippet] HOW is this not viral yet? [Show rating: 9/10] Everyone go follow @artist NOW.
scripts.virality: Very High - altruistic content + artist will share

scripts.title: Rating Accuracy Flex
scripts.body: [Show stats screen] 150 ratings. 94% match with community. Executive rank. I'm basically A&R now.
scripts.virality: Medium - achievement content, good for community

content_mix_strategy.explainer_videos: 20% - What is FF, how it works

tiktok_best_practices.text_overlay_essentials: Make it readable in 3 seconds without sound
tiktok_best_practices.duet_stitch_potential: Create content others can respond to
tiktok_best_practices.face_on_camera: Algorithm favors human faces over screen recordings
tiktok_best_practices.comment_baiting: Ask questions, create debates, poll options
